page.title: 11LEISURE ACTIVITIES Cont.
page.content: Off Ground IT.First somebody gets picked to be IT.Then all the others get a chance to run away.When they've run away the person who's IT chases them.Anything that is Off Ground is Home.Off Ground means anywhere you can stand not on the ground,like on a stone,a raised kerb,window ledge,or a drain cover,etc. You are not allowed to stay on the same Home for too long. If IT touches you when you are running between Homes you become IT. Cat and Mouse.First everyone stands against a wall and two teams, a Home, and a Prison are chosen.One team are the Cats and the other the Mice.Then the Mice get ten seconds to run away before the Cats chase them and try to put them in the Prison.Mice cannot be caught in their Home,once caught can be rescued by free Mice touching them. Change round when all Mice are caught.
